summary: Summon a Keeper from Dawnguard through a shout
descriptionHtml:
Adds a shout that summons the Keepers from the Soul Cairn.

Shouts summons the keepers in this order based on how long you hold the button for
Mace & Shield > Bow > 2H Sword

Requirements
Dawnguard

Installation
place \"Summon Keeper.esp\" into the data folder then enable it.

To access the words in-game use the console command

player.teachword xx005745
player.teachword xx005746
player.teachword xx005747

Replace xx with the load order index. The command will give you the words locked and will require dragon souls. Otherwise use the player.unlockword command to enable you to use them straight away.
author: lilaznkilla
